programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Between the sea and the desert. Thats the fine line we travel on this trip to Egypt. To the south of Hurghada, on the Red Sea, there is a desert peninsula called Soma Bay, which were going to explore. We start with a fun quad bike safari, that takes us towards the arid and rocky hinterland. Finally we arrive at a Bedouin village, hidden among the mountains. We then return to the coast, in order to discover Soma Bays other side, made up of oasis and luxury. There, you can enjoy every benefit from the sea. For example, in the Thalassic spa, in the quiet and relaxed atmosphere, or in the Soma Bay Kite House, where active people can enjoy kitesurf. We also want to appreciate, in the best possible way, the outstanding beauty of this sea, so we dive down into its depths, to be among the star fish and corals, Butterfly fish and Moray eels, sea turtles and Clown fish.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! Youll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And youll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, well CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: After constructing dirt roads and river crossings, access to the new mining site is completed. Warren and Konrad are first to the reach the hotspot and setup in prime position, but the equipment is not running properly. There is a confrontation between Gary and Peter on the way to the site about Garys reckless driving. The divers start to pump the river bank. The classifiers and jig are processing concentrate: bags are slowly being filled. However, there are constant breakdowns and stoppages as the team try to find a way to get the pumps primed and running at full power. They are desperately searching for solutions and have taken to repairing and modifying the equipment on site. This is starting to affect productivity and morale. A new plan is hatched to solve the pump problems: get larger and more powerful pumps. The divers are dispatched to fetch these from South Africa, but they are much to heavy for the trailers used to tow them. The trip back over the mountain passes is made even more dangerous because of the overloaded trailers. The new pumps are set up the next day, but they come with problems of their own. Jan, the equipment supplier, returns to find a solution to the pumping dilemma. He doesnt believe the machines can work at altitude. There is a confrontation between Jan and the miners. They take him to task about his lack of foresight and research. Warren has a close call when he breathes poisonous fumes while diving. Luckily Gary notices and pulls him from the water. Peter returns to the valley with a new plan to use the smaller pumps. Warren drives the TLB too close to Gary and endangers him by dropping big boulders while he is diving. Warren and Gary continue to aggravate each other and they get drunk and have a fistfight while at a nearby ski resort. Gary is badly beaten and injured. There is a lot of fallout when they return to the lodge. Garys jaw is in a bad way and there are fears it may be broken. Don and Konrad are concerned by Garys behaviour and debate his future at the mine.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Tanner Hall is todays most influential skier. He has won every contest, he knows every trick and there is seemingly nothing he cannot do. An idol for some, a nemesis for others, Hall is no stranger to controversy.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Creative Killers
programme.desc: Peppered across Africa are a few iconic locations that are renowned for killing action. Arenas bathed in a history of blood, places where Africas icons have hunted successfully for generations. Predators here develop unique and clever ways to hunt. But the circumstances arent the driving factor in this story. Sometimes these predators look for the perfect patch of ground to kill, a small area of long grass, or a single path that leads to the perfect ambush. How do they amplify their age-old skills by using the lie of the land? Savuti is big cat country. But only the most resourceful cats make it to the top.The Marsh Pride, Savutis resident lions, is faced with their toughest challenge this winter: Buffalo. The complicated mix of boggy marsh, open plains and dense woodland provide extra obstacles in their path to a meal. Over centuries these heavyweights have adapted their hunting strategy to Savutis every challenge and the buffalos every move. And their secret: The nighttime hunt. When the sun sets, the tables begin to turn and Savuti is at the prides mercy. But theres no shortage of challenges: Saba, the pride matriarch and most experienced hunter, has got to provide for her pride and keep them, and her territory, safe from two young male lions that are trespassing on Marsh Pride territory. It all seems doable until she gets injured after a run-in with hyenas… A lone female leopard is Savutis ultimate innovator. Her environment has forced her to change her hunting strategy and her prey, and shes thriving!We follow three characters through Savutis winter, starting with the disappearance of the small game and the arrival of the buffalo. The film looks at how our characters use the environment and features of the landscape to their advantage. We focus on the numerous challenges of Savuti - the things that make it such a hostile place for predators, and also highlight the inter-predatory battles between the Marsh Pride and the Nomads. We look at the challenges the young leopard is faced with while hunting under the lions radar and trying to survive in her non-leopard-friendly environment.

programme.title: Africas Deadliest
programme.desc: A national Geographic documentary looking into the deadliest animals that roam Africa. Examining animals that have evolved complex weapons from teeth to claws and agility so that they can protect themselves and battle effectively. From elephant tusks that can defend or attack to the fur, speed and agility of seals. Showing how these animals have exceptional skills and power alongside their body features that have developed into ideal tools for their needs.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Camouflaged cats. Some animals will never be inconspicuous, others blend so perfectly with their surroundings that they can move through them without detection. For many of the cats of Africa, camouflage is key to survival. From the spots of the cheetah, the rosettes of the leopard and the stripes and dots of the serval, these cats have evolved to merge with their habitat. Hidden lizards. Feeding on these harvester ants, is a beautifully adapted predator, the regal horned lizard. Merging perfectly with their surroundings these small reptiles live in the rocky, gravelly, desert like habitats of Arizona where they make a living almost exclusively on ants. Cryptic snakes. In the leaf litter of Australias woodlands and scrub hides one of its most cryptic and dangerous snakes – the death adder. The camouflaging patterns of snakes are mesmerizing – from the pearly multicolored sheen of the carpet python to the mottled bands of the death adder, snakes can be hidden right before our eyes. Shimmering cuttlefish . Many animals can hide and many can disguise themselves to some degree, but few can rival the camouflaging capabilities of the magnificent cuttlefish. Cuttlefish can not only change color, they can also change their shape as well as their texture as they morph through seamless variations of themselves.…. and concealed chameleons. Making camouflage an art form are the verdant sauntering highly distinctive chameleons that make their homes in rain forests, grasses, trees and bushes. There are well over 100 species of chameleon around today, ranging from the tiny pygmy chameleon to the prehistoric looking horned chameleon, most are found in Africa and Madagascar. Birds. In the frozen climbs of the northern hemisphere winter, ptarmigans blend against their snowy surroundings. Invisible spiders - Crab Spider. There is one tiny creature that has evolved a camouflage that is so perfect in its simplicity it is often overlooked by the casual human observer. Adapted to their hunting terrain the crab spiders that are found on bark and leaves are darker in coloration than those found on flowers which is the master of disguise?

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The most venomous snake on land. The deserted heart of the Australian outback, where people seldom venture, is the hot, baked home of the most venomous land snake in the world - the inland taipan, a two meter long snake with enough venom in one bite to kill a quarter of a million mice. The rare envenomating lizard. Venom is not the exclusive domain of snakes and spiders. In the deserts of the south-west United States and the north west of Mexico lives the striking and venomous Gila Monster - the largest land lizard in North America. Blue ringed octopus. In the shallow waters of the Pacific Ocean is an animal the size of a golf ball that carries with it not one, but two types of venom. One is used on its main prey of crabs and is relatively harmless to humans, the other is used in defense and can kill an adult human in minutes. The tiny toxin wielding Red-backed spider. In secluded outhouses, under fences and letterboxes, under barbeques and amongst garden litter are the messy webs that hold the killing fields and the hundreds of offspring of a very deadly female. Tucked in the corner of her web the scarlet stripe of the red-back spider advertises her lethal capabilities. The feroci

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The targeting Archer fish. Just below the surface of the water is one of natures most precise miniature hunters – the fabulous Archer fish. Able to shoot down their prey with targeted jet propelled water darts the archer fish is bulls-eye accurate. The ambushing Portia. A mere centimeter in length, the Portia spider is one of natures most capable and intelligent hunters. A formidable serial killer of other spiders, Portias are fast to learn and quick to adapt. The harpooning cone shell. In an ocean full of fast moving and agile fish, those that hunt them need sure fire methods of capture. So it is perhaps surprising that one of their most deadly adversaries, is a very slow moving snail. Weapon swinging Bolas Spiders. As the day comes to and darkness sets in, one of the worlds most deceptive hunters begins her nightly rituals. Dangling from the silken trapeze line she has just laid the female Bolas Spider spins a short silken thread punctuated with tiny globules and ending in one huge sticky silken bolas. Slave Making Ants. Running over almost every corner of the earth are millions and millions of tiny worker ants. Yet for some ant species, most of the workers are not their own blood. These are the slave makers trap laying Ant Lions. Throughout the sandy soils that blanket the earth there are hundreds of species of ants making a living on the land they find themselves. Yet there is one insect whose larvae makes a living on them – the one and a half centimeter, cunning, powerful, ferocious and often inconspicuous Ant lion Parasitic Pompilid wasps In the dunes of the Namib Desert is a little wasp that seeks out a very certain type of prey. Pompilid wasps, also known as spider wasps are named after the food they seek, and they are extremely good at seeking it.…which is the top of the micro predators?

programme.title: Cheetahs Of the Deep
programme.desc: The Canary Islands are sheltered by a mild climate, protected from any extremes of weather. But high up on the towering mountains, the conditions can turn treacherous. In winter, water is released by high altitude storms and fertilized by nutrients washed from the soil. As this drains into the sea the soupy waters around the islands attract a huge variety of life, draw in in from the vast Atlantic Ocean. Many whale and dolphin species congregate in these waters, but above all Short-finned pilot whales are found here in the vast numbers.Isora is the leader and matriarch of one of the largest resident pilot whale pods between Tenerife and La Gomera and we document her activities over a one year period. Several females and their offspring form the hard-core of this close-knit society where all the main family members are related to the mother. Males in the pod also play a role, but not in reproduction, as they are blood relatives. With their vow of chastity, they ensure the protection of newborns and juveniles - a long-term investment which is crucial for pod survival.Physical contact is important for the whales and the film reveals moving and rarely-seen interaction between the older pod members and the new arrivals. But this carefree innocence is undermined by harrowing footage of the effect plastic waste is having on the whales and other species. Large squid are the pilot whales preferred food source and the best feeding grounds lie a thousand metres deep. But they are masters of deep diving and are involved in titanic battles with the squid on daily basis.As the mothers give birth we examine the close bonds between the new arrivals and the pod, and how the whales deal with the tragic death of one of the calves.This film also looks at other whale and dolphin species which frequent the area, including the rarely seen Rissos dolphin, Brydes Whales and Atlantic Spotted Dolphins. Green sea turtles also frequent the area, attracted by the rich-sea grass beds which surround the islands.Filmed in stunning HD, this film delivers a comprehensive portrait of a unique and protected underwater haven, one of Europes last frontiers before the mysterious deep Atlantic takes hold.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Ten years ago, thousands of US and Coalition forces personnel, ranging from elite soldiers to reservists, found themselves in the middle of two conﬂ icts that required an entirely diﬀ erent approach to warfare than they had previously experienced. From special forces units securing vital points of strategic interest and capturing key individuals in Afghanistan. This episode of CQB takes a close look at some of at how special operations were integrated into regular units and how they fought through many close quarter combat situations with a combination of intelligence, high-tech weaponry and surveillance technologies to ﬁ nd and capture Saddam Hussein.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Vakars Misisipi kazino pārvēršas par murgu - tiek nolaupīta skaista sieva un māte. Izmeklētāji atklāj dažas pārsteidzošas patiesības, un aizdomās turamie ir ārkārtīgi daudz. Notiek kāds šokējošs pavērsiens, kas beidzot noved pie aresta.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kāda vīrieša slepkavība ārpus mājas Memfisas piepilsētā noved izmeklētājus līdz ziņām par ārlaulības sakariem, sievas slepeno dzīvi, apdrošināšanas polisi un brāli, kurš ir gatavs darīt jebko savas māsas labā.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Kad savās mājās tiek atklāta noslepkavota ģimene, policija sāk medības trīs štatos, cenšoties atrast aukstasinīgos slepkavas.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Iebrukums mājās aizsāk masīvas medības pa vientuļo, sniegoto Aidaho tuksnesi, kur tiek meklēti divi bankas aplaupītāji. Viņi savulaik palīdzēja notvert bēdīgi slaveno padomju spiegu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsas detektīvi cenšas saprast, kam uzticēties, kad vīrieti nošauj un notriec automašīna. Atlantā kāds bruņots vīrietis atklāj uguni pie naktskluba.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kanzasas Sitija. Kad vīrietis tiek nošauts, aizstāvot savu sievu, Sitijas policijas detektīvi cer, ka viņa bijusī sieva varēs atklāt, kas, iespējams, vēlējās viņu nogalināt.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Kad svētki sāk aprimt, raksturi pierimst un kāds pazūd. Dažas dienas vēlāk kādas Ziemeļkalifornijas pilsētas nolaistā daļā tiek uziets ķermenis. Kad lietas virzība apstājas, būs vajadzīgs ļoti negaidīts notikums, lai beidzot notvertu slepkavu.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Mīklainos apstākļos izceļas ugunsgrēks dzīvoklī, un izmeklētāji pārbauda gruvešus, lai atklātu notikumus, kas noveda pie šīs katastrofas. Atkājas, ka tā nebija nejaušība, un sākas darbs, lai slepkavu iesēdinātu aiz restēm.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Sandjego Action Sports konvencija kļūst nāvējoša. Pēc nakts ballītēm Gaslamp rajonā pazudis praktikants mārketingā. Pierādījumu gūzma ved izmeklētājus pie šokējoša atklājuma.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Veiksmīgas uzņēmējas un mātes Makevas Dženkinsas nāve izraisa intensīvu izmeklēšanu, taču, lai atklātu maskās tērpto uzbrucēju, būs jāatmasko aizdomās turamo plejāde, tā atmaskojot šīs slepkavas attiecības.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Homoseksuāla ogļrača Breda Makgerija nošaušana Bellērā, Ohaio štatā, izmeklētājiem rada aizdomas par naida noziegumu, taču, kad atklājas šokējošs noslēpums, tas atklāj negaidītu slepkavības motīvu.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Pēc 50 gadiem Čārlza Mensona stāsts ir kļuvis par leģendu, bet - kas ir fakts un kas izdomājums? Aizmirstiet visu dzirdēto, jo "Helter Skelter" ienirs vēl neizstāstītā stāstā par 20. gadsimta sensacionālāko slepkavību sēriju.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Helter Skelter bija visas nepieciešamās sastāvdaļas. Kā apstākļu vētra salauza jaunu zēnu un palīdzēja radīt vienu no visu laiku noslēpumainākajiem noziedzniekiem?

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Tikko no cietuma izlaistais, "Helter Skelter" seko topošajam mūziķim Mensonam un viņa jaunajai "ģimenei" Losandželosā. Tajā viņš satiekas ar rokenrola karalisko aprindu pārstāvjiem un gandrīz noslēdz ierakstu līgumu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Sieviete ar mācīšanās grūtībām apsūdz strādnieku par nepiedienīgu izrādīšanos viņas dzīvoklī.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Kādam cilvēkam uzbrukts un pēc šī uzbrukuma upuris ir komā. Policija mēģina izmantot DNS, lai apkopotu notikušo.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Filam Spektoram, dēvētam par "trako ģēniju" rokenrolā, bija tieksme pēc ieročiem. Kad policija tiek izsaukta uz viņa savrupmāju, viņi tur atrod sievietes līķi un mūzikas leģendu, kas, šķiet, ir kļuvusi nekontrolējama. Kurš izšāva ieroci? Un kāpēc?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā 500 vīriešu snieguši liecības, ka, apmeklējot Floridas reformu skolu, viņi cietuši no fiziskas un seksuālas vardarbības. Citi stāsta, ka universitātes pilsētiņā studenti nogalināti. Izmeklētāji atklāj satraucošus faktus un neiedomājamas patiesības.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Divus vīriešus notiesā par desmit gadus vecās Žanīnas Nikariko nolaupīšanu un nogalināšanu, piespriežot nāvessodu. Abi vīrieši uzstāj uz savu nevainību, un cīnās, lai noskaidrotu īsto slepkavu pirms nāvessoda izpildes datuma.

programme.desc: Precējušies 33 gadus, cienījams matemātikas skolotājs un viņa sieva dodas uz Lasvegasu, lai atzīmētu viņas 50. dzimšanas dienu. Kad Everilda Vatsone pazūd, policija no diviem štatiem apvieno spēkus un tvarsta sievietes slepkavu.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Mītisks rasu karš, slavas reibonis un narkotiku darījumi liek Čārlzam Mensonam cīnīties, lai saglabātu savu kultu. "Helter Skelter" atklāj, kā ar programmēšanas, narkotiku un vardarbības palīdzību viņš galu galā pārliecināja savus sekotājus nogalināt.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Dudlijas policija ir sacelta kājās par dubultslepkavību autostāvvietā, sākas aizdomās turētā slepkavas meklējumi.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: 2003. gadā Ņujorkas finanšu analītiķe Marija Krūza pazūd, un pazūd arī pēdējais vīrietis, kuru viņa redzēja. No Manhetenas līdz Ņūarkai Vanity Fair īpašais korespondents Braiens Berou seko šim stāstam par medicīnisko krāpšanu, zagtām narkotikām un neizsakāmiem noziegumiem.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Sieviete no Talsas Oklahomā bēguļo pēc sava drauga slepkavības. Armijas veterāns tiek nošauts pēc palīdzēšanas bezpajumtniekam Atlantā.

programme.title: Noslepkavots no rīta
programme.desc: Izsmalcinātā Koralgeiblsas kopiena Floridā tiek satricināta līdz pamatiem - nakts vidū tiek sašauts viens no elites pārstāvjiem un vēl viens noslepkavots. Likumsargi ir apņēmušies nomedīt bīstamu slepkavu.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Precējušies 33 gadus, cienījams matemātikas skolotājs un viņa sieva dodas uz Lasvegasu, lai atzīmētu viņas 50. dzimšanas dienu. Kad Everilda Vatsone pazūd, policija no diviem štatiem apvieno spēkus un tvarsta sievietes slepkavu.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeka mamma agri ieradusies brīvdienās. Dženna mēģina uzmundrināt Lizu ar savām pārsteiguma kāzām, un Treisijs ar Florences Hendersones palīdzību cenšas piepildīt Keneta vēlmi, lai viņa dzīve būtu vairāk līdzīga TV.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks ar Devona Benksa palīdzību plāno pārņemt Kebltaunas izpilddirektora amatu. Liza saņem sliktas ziņas no adopcijas aģentūras, un galvenā aktrise Treisija Harietas Tubmenas biogrāfiskajā filmā izrādās paša Treisija sievietes versija.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ņujorkas pievārtē kādā senlaicīgā un baisā Steitenailendas mājā mitinās iedzīvotāji, kuru dzīve lielākoties sākas iestājoties tumsai. Nama stāvus apdzīvo trīs asinsūcēji vampīri – Nandors, Lazlo un Nadja –, enerģijas vampīrs Kolins Robinsons, kurš strādā birojā un ar savu nomācošo klātbūtni izsūc enerģiju saviem kolēģiem, un Giljermo, Nadīnas paziņa. Kā jau kārtīgi vampīri, viņi ir vairākus gadsimtus seni, un iekļaušanās mūsdienu pasaulē tiem nereti sagādā galvassāpes. Otrajā sezonā vampīriem būs jāsaskaras ar zombijiem, raganām, spokiem, slepkavām, interneta troļļiem un citiem mošķiem. Tikmēr Giljermo būs jāizšķiras, vai pašam kļūt par vampīru.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ieskats trīs vampīru ikdienas (vai drīzāk – iknakts) dzīvē Steitenailendā, kur viņi kopā pavadījuši nu jau vairāk nekā 100 gadus.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Kāzu dienā Britas nervozitāte liek viņai pieņemt negaidītu lēmumu. Kerola un Bobs paceļ savas attiecības jaunā līmenī. Sema uzzina patiesību par Džeimsu un ir satricināta par to, kāda varētu būt viņas nākotne.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema spriež vai viņa var pāriet darbā no sava vecā "es", vienlaikus mēģinot orientēties attiecībās ar "normālo". Kerola ielūkojas Semas istabā un izdara šausmīgu atklājumu. Džoels un Džeimss kopīgi pavada vakaru.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Semas jaunatklātā pašapziņa tiek satricināta - viņa uzzina, ka viņas jaunais priekšnieks ir pagātnes rēgs. Tikmēr Felīcija kļūdās, apsveicot savu draugu ar viņa paaugstināšanu amatā. Un Olīvija pieņem dzīvi mainošu lēmumu.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema spriež vai viņa var pāriet darbā no sava vecā "es", vienlaikus mēģinot orientēties attiecībās ar "normālo". Kerola ielūkojas Semas istabā un izdara šausmīgu atklājumu. Džoels un Džeimss kopīgi pavada vakaru.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Sema uzzina, ka Kerola ir pārkāpusi viņas privātumu, abas sāk sprādzienbīstamu cīņu, liekot Bobam mēģināt būt par starpnieku. Kamēr ar Pīteru viss iet labi, Felīcija saņem nevēlamu ciemiņu no viņas pagātnes.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs aizved Gloriju pie Deivida Brennera. Mičels un Kamerons cenšas pierunāt Meniju uz randiņu. Fils un Klēra cenšas paspilgtināt lietas, dodoties romantiskā atpūtā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Trešajā mēģinājumā nokārtot auto eksāmenu Heilija saskaras ar biedējošu braukšanas eksaminētāju. Aleksu satrauc skolas dejas. Glorija apsmej Džeju un Meniju, lai viņi izbrauktu ar amerikāņu kalniņiem. Fils un Lūks zem mājas meklē dārgumus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs nejauši nogalina Menija bruņurupuci un melo par to. Klēra kļūst greizsirdīga - Fila bijusī draudzene ieradusies ciemos. Mičels pieņem drosmīgu lēmumu. Viņš nokavējis ģimenes dienu, jo viņam bija jābūt darbā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs un Mičels mēģina izveidot attiecības, vērojot meteoru lietu, taču nekas nenotiek saskaņā ar plānu. Glorija un Kamerons cenšas atrast kaut ko citu, lai pavadītu kopīgi laiku. Klēra un Fils cenšas palīdzēt saviem bērniem viņu skolas projektos.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs izaicina Gloriju un Meniju uz izcilu šaha spēli. Klēra dara visu, lai atrastu jaunu gadžetu Fila dzimšanas dienas dāvanai, bet Kamerons bāž degunu kaimiņu lietās.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs domā, ka viņa bērniem Roberts patīk labāk nekā viņš pats.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debrai ir grūti tikt galā ar vecāku šķiršanos.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks, Rejs un Roberts krāso Reja māju. Roberts un Rejs uzzina ko jaunu par savu tēvu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Atskats uz laiku, kad dzima Alija.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debra ilgojas pēc mierīgas un klusas dzimšanas dienas mājās, kopā ar Reimondu. Viņš stāsta saviem vecākiem un brālim, ka nekādas ballītes nebūs.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls stāvvietā nejauši uzbrauc virsū Mereditai, un viņa vainas apziņa liek organizēt viņai veltītu 5K skrējienu. Dvaits un Andžela sastrīdas, jo viņš nogalinājis viņas kaķi, un tiek atklātas Džima un Pemas attiecības.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls jūtas apdraudēts, jo Raiens atgriezies Skrentonas birojā, lai dalītos savās idejās par Dunder Mifflin nākotni. Džima un Pemas attiecības nonāk atklātībā pa visu biroju, savukārt Andželas un Dvaita attiecības ir iesprūdušas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls jūtas apdraudēts, jo Raiens atgriezies Skrentonas birojā, lai dalītos savās idejās par Dunder Mifflin nākotni. Džima un Pemas attiecības nonāk atklātībā pa visu biroju, savukārt Andželas un Dvaita attiecības ir iesprūdušas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Tiek atkļata Dunder Mifflin Infinity mājaslapa, un Maikls ir sajūsmā par došanos uz lielo atklāšanas ballīti Ņujorkā. Tikmēr Andžela plāno satelītballīti Skrentonas filiālē. Dvaits sacenšas ar mājaslapu, lai noskaidrotu, kurš vienas dienas laikā var pārdot visvairāk papīru.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks un Liza dodas uz Floridu. Tur viņi uzzina šokējošu noslēpumu par Džeka mirušo māti, un Heizela iesūdz kanālu par seksuālu uzmākšanos.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lizas adopcijas pieprasījums beidzot ir apstiprināts, taču viņa ir pārāk aizņemta, mēģinot vienatnē glābt TGS no bojāejas, un nepamana šo apstiprinājumu. Kenets cenšas palīdzēt Džekam, cenšoties izvēlēties savu pēcteci.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza risina jautājumus ar māti, kas paliek mājās, kamēr Džeks cenšas atrast patiesu laimi. Gan Kenets, gan Treisijs pielāgojas Keneta jaunajam NBC prezidenta amatam.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Aktieri un komanda satiekas pēdējā TGS sērijā.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nandora mīlas meklējumi beidzot rezultējas panākumiem, bet Nadja apjauš, ka viņas mūža lielākā ambīcija ir atvērt savu vampīru naktsklubu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nadjas naktskluba atklāšanas diena ir apdraudēta - savu uzstāšanos atcēlis kāds ievērojams mūziķis.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri devušies ceļojumā uz slepeno Nakts tirgu, kur uz tirgošanos un laika kopā pavadīšanu satiekas visas pārdabiskās būtnes.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri uzsākuši privātskolas interviju procesu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Giljermo pazaudē prātu, cenšoties palīdzēt Nandorai izplānot perfektas vampīru kāzas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kamēr Rejs saka cieņpilnu runu sava mīļākā onkuļa bērēs, ierodas viņa tante Alda, lai atjaunotu ģimenes nesaskaņas ar Mariju.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema un Alekss gatavojas savai pirmajai romantiskajai nedēļas nogalei izbraukumā, kamēr Britai pārsteidzošos veidos ir grūti tikt galā ar vientulību. Kerola negribīgi izmēģina Al-Anon, un Džeimss meklē palīdzību.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema saņem iespēju intervēt Dragu karalieni Bobu, taču viņa sabotē savu iespēju, kad viņai un Aleksam ir pirmās ķildas. Tikmēr Kerola ir spiesta nopietni uztvert savu Al-Anon programmu, un Džeimss mēģina atjaunot saikni ar Mindiju.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs un Fils sacenšas par vienu un to pašu trenera vietu Menija un Lūka basketbola komandā. Mičels palīdz Kameronam darba intervijā. Glorija un Klēra runā par bērnu augšanu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kamerons vēlas pievienoties Dilana grupai. Klērai rodas aizdomas, jo ciemos ierodas Fila tēvs. Meniju traumē šausmu filma.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nandora un Laszlo risina savas domstarpības, esot nomaļā namiņā. Nadjai ir meiteņu nakts. Giljermo pirmo reizi 12 gadu laikā pavada laiku ar ģimeni.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Ieskats trīs vampīru ikdienas (vai drīzāk – iknakts) dzīvē Steitenailendā, kur viņi kopā pavadījuši nu jau vairāk nekā 100 gadus.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Ciema iedzīvotāji arvien vairāk sāk interesēties par ziņu vietējā avīzē, kur tiek paziņots par slepkavību tajā pašā vakarā. Vai tā ir slepkavības spēle?

programme.title: Džeina Eira
programme.desc: Bārene Džeina Eira kļūst par guvernanti Tornfīldholā. Pirmo reizi viņa jūtas kaut kur piederīga, tomēr kādā dienā viņu pamodina dīvainas skaņas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Ir Jaungada vakars, un uz kluba grīdas tiek atrasts populāras dziedātājas līķis. Mēs pagriežam laiku atpakaļ, un Peregrīne saprot, ka visu nakti ir vērojusi slepkavu, to neapzinoties.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mārplas jaunkundze uzskata, ka Krekentorpu īpašumā ir paslēpts līķis un izmeklē šo turīgo klanu pēc tam, kad kāds viņas draugs redz brutālu nožņaugšanu garāmbraucošā vilcienā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Detektīvs Ficrojs pamana, ka kāds no kolēģiem izmanto nepatiesus pierādījumus, lai apsūdzētu kādu aizdomās turamo. Tā kā Hercogs ir devies projām, viņš nolīgst Elīzu, lai izmeklētu korupciju policijā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīzai ir iespēja atrast milzīgu bagātību, kad viņa piedāvā palīdzību iespējamajam mantiniekam. Tomēr viņai būs jāiesaista arī Hercogs, lai gan jauni fakti padara šādu sadarbību neiespējamu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza pa pastu saņem spridzekli. Kas to nosūtījis un kāpēc? Elīza apvienojas ar Hercogu, Mozu un seno ienaidnieku Patriku Nešu, lai uzzinātu, kas sūtījis šo nāvējošo dāvanu.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza ir pārņēmusi Londonas detektīvu aģentūru "Nešs un dēli"; tomēr ne viss izdodas. Viņas attiecībās ar Hercogu paliek skaidrs, ka jāpieņem lēmums, kas visu mainīs.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Krebtrijs piedalās kaujas rekonstrukcijā, kuras laikā tiek nogalināts viens no tās dalībniekiem.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mēdoks pārceļas uz pansiju, kur kāds dīvains īrnieks pieprasa, lai Mērdoks palīdz izmeklēt ēkā notikušu slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Krebtrijs un Efija ierodas uz Dikensa dzimšanas dienas svinībām, mājastēvs tiek atrasts miris.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad tiek nolaupīta Higinsa brāļa sieva, viņš tiek aizsūtīts ar izpirkuma naudu un pazūd. Mērdoks uzsāk vajāšanu.

programme.title: Tesa no dErbervilu cilts
programme.desc: Pēc traumatiskas tikšanās ar manipulatīvo Aleksu nabadzīgā Tesa mēģina atjaunot līdzsvaru savā dzīvē un iemīlas ideālistā Endželā. Kad par sevi atgādina pagātne, šīs jūtas tiek atklātas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids meklē atbildes par noslēpumainu jaunu zēnu, kuru šķietami meklē pilnīgi visi. Samīrs paslēpj zēnu, un neviens nezina, ko īsti domāt par viņa uzrakstīto.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Sisi un Rūdolfs bauda laiku uz salas. Francis baidās no Vācijas un Krievijas alianses un uzzina, kur atrodas sieva un dēls.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Francis un Sisi apvienojas Francijas dienvidos. Tad Francis slepeni dodas uz Vīni kopā ar Rūdolfu. Sisi vairs nekas nav atlicis, bet Francis drīz sāk apšaubīt savu lēmumu.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Ciema iedzīvotāji arvien vairāk sāk interesēties par ziņu vietējā avīzē, kur tiek paziņots par slepkavību tajā pašā vakarā. Vai tā ir slepkavības spēle?

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Stāsts par 12 gadus senu vēsturi, kad Djūks un Elīza pirmo reizi satikās.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir Džimija kristību diena. Visi apņēmušies to kārtīgi nosvinēt, Helēnai un Hola kundzei gatavojoties uzņemt Džeimsa vecākus. Sigfrīds raksta krusttēva runu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laukā tiek atrasti vairāki sadalījušies līķi, Mērdokam šķiet, ka citu kultūru vīriešiem uzbrūk sērijveida slepkava.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad strādnieka nāve izraisa streiku, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka tas viss ir saistīts ar arodbiedrības veidošanos.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: 1955. gada vasarā ar nazi tiek sadurta jauna sieviete, kas ir ceturtā nogalinātā dažu nedēļu laikā. Vai Megrē spēs atrast slepkavu pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: 1955. gada vasarā ar nazi tiek sadurta jauna sieviete, kas ir ceturtā nogalinātā dažu nedēļu laikā. Vai Megrē spēs atrast slepkavu pirms nākamā uzbrukuma?

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tikšanās ar Ogdenu kādā krodziņā Mērdoks satiek populāru detektīvu, un jauna laimes meklētāja tiek atrasta mirusi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Šī kriminālseriāla darbība sākās 1970. gadu Anglijā, un tas tiek stāstīts no enigmatiska detektīva P. D. Džeimsa skatpunkta un seko Dalglīša karjerai līdz mūsdienām.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Stāsts par 12 gadus senu vēsturi, kad Djūks un Elīza pirmo reizi satikās.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Ir Džimija kristību diena. Visi apņēmušies to kārtīgi nosvinēt, Helēnai un Hola kundzei gatavojoties uzņemt Džeimsa vecākus. Sigfrīds raksta krusttēva runu.

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Jail Caesar
programme.desc: Paul Schoolman, a filmmaker from South Africa chose to portray the early years in the life of Julius Caesar through a story told from three prisons (Pollsmoor, Cape Town, Cardiff in Wales, and Drumheller in Canada). While he hired such great actors as Derek Jacobi, he also engaged a cast of real inmates. The movie was screened at several film festivals including Moscow and Chicago.

programme.title: Blind Obsession
programme.desc: During a gun battle with a pair of criminal brothers, police officer Jack Fletcher (Brad Johnson) incurs a wound that leaves him temporarily sightless. During his recovery, Jack is helped by Rebecca (Megan Gallagher), who works as a "trainer" for the newly blind. Gradually, Jack and Rebecca fall in love, much to the dismay of Rebeccas overprotective sister, Bedelia (Roxana Zal), who as a childhood incest victim has developed a pathological hatred for all men. Thus, once his sight is restored, Jack finds himself in the crosshairs of two potential assassins -- the demented Bedelia, and the brother of the crook he killed.

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A groom (Ed Burns) and his four attendants wrestle with issues related to friendship and maturity a week before the big day.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: Blackjack
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren plays Jack Devlin, a U.S Marshal who protects high-profile clients when it comes to a matter of security.

programme.title: A Mothers Testimony
programme.desc: An ex-convicts mothers worst suspicions about her son are confirmed when he is implicated in a murder.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Nupat kā par vientuļniekiem kļuvušie trīsdesmitgadnieki Pīters un Emma nolēmuši sadarboties, lai sabotētu savu bijušo jaunās attiecības un atgūtu viņus uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Sociālais tīkls
programme.desc: Kādā rudens naktī Harvardas students Marks Cukerbergs, kas ir datorprogrammēšanas ģēnijs, pārdzīvo šķiršanos no savas draudzenes un lieto pārāk daudz alkohola. Aizkaitināts un apreibis, viņš raksta blogus, ielaužas universitāšu mājas lapās un zog studentu attēlus, lai tos izvietotu savā, tikko izveidotajā mājas lapā. Šajā rudens naktī pamazām dzimst ideja par šobrīd pasaulē lielākā sociālā tīkla facebook izveidi.

programme.desc: Ziemeļu meža ceļš.

programme.title: Spiegs kļūdas pēc
programme.desc: Futbola huligānam Nobijam ir viss, par ko mazpilsētas Grimsbijas iedzīvotājs vien var sapņot, - ieskaitot 11 bērnus un smukāko meiteni ziemeļaustrumu Anglijā. Arī viņa kvēlākā velēšanas tūlīt piepildīsies - Nobijs beidzot satiks jaunāko brāli, no kura viņš ticis atšķirts vēl bērnībā un kuru meklējis 28 gadus! Taču Nobijam nav ne jausmas, ka Sebastians tagad ir ļoti bīstams slepenais aģents. Turklāt tikko izziņots globāls teroristu uzbrukums...

programme.title: Muļķu nauda
programme.desc: Parasts puisis iegulda savus iekrājumus videospēļu veikala GameStop akcijās un sāk par to rakstīt internetā. Kad viņa ieraksti sociālajos tīklos kļūst aizvien populārāki, un akciju tēma kļūst par kustību, visi kļūst bagāti - līdz pretī cīnīties sāk miljardieri.

programme.title: P.S. Es mīlu tevi
programme.desc: Holija Kenedija ir skaista, gudra un precējusies ar savu mūža mīlestību - kaislīgu, jautru un impulsīvu īru puisi Geriju. Taču kad slimība atņem Gerija dzīvību, Holijas dzīvei arī vairs nav jēgas. Vienīgais, kurš spētu palīdzēt, ir cilvēks, kura vairs nav. Neviens nepazīst Holiju labāk kā Gerijs. To viņš apzinājās vēl dzīvs būdams, un tāpēc uzrakstīja Holijai vēstules, kas palīdzēs bēdās un ļaus sākt dzīvi no jauna.

programme.title: Favorīte

programme.title: Bellas salas maģija
programme.desc: Vesternu romānu autors, alkoholiķis Montijs Vildhorns ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa brāļadēls mudina viņu uz vasaru doties uz kluso Bellas salu. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar vientuļo mammu un viņas 3 meitenēm, kas palīdz viņam rast iedvesmu atsākt rakstīt.

programme.title: Maigās jūtas
programme.desc: Kādā jaukā dienā Natalī noskūpsta savu kolēģi Markusu. Bez jebkāda iemesla - tāpat vien. Noskūpsta un pat nepievērš tam uzmanību. Taču Markuss nepaliek vienaldzīgs: nejaušs skūpsts apgriež viņa dzīvi kājām gaisā! Tagad viņš nevar domāt ne par ko citu, kā vien par Natalī. Vai Natalī atbildēs viņa jūtām?

programme.title: Pianists
programme.desc: Otrā pasaules kara laikā atzīts poļu mūziķis Vladislavs pazaudējis kontaktu ar savu ģimeni. Situācija kļūst aizvien sliktāka, un viņš izdzīvošanas nolūkos paslēpjas Varšavas drupās.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Ghost Town Gourmet. Robert Irvine heads to an abandoned mining town in Cerro Gordo, CA. He prepares a meal using the same ingredients and equipment as the miners had in 1865.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Mission in Paradise. Robert Irvine makes a feast without a kitchen for 30 people in Oahu, Hawaii. He battles the weather and manages an unpredictable underground oven.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Lobster Rolls. Inspired by her honeymoon in Maine, Joanna makes lobster rolls, hush puppies, wedge salad with blue cheese dressing and cherries jubilee.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Italian Eats. Joanna makes an Italian meal including pink baked ziti, roasted garlic parmesan toast and antipasto salad with sun-dried tomato vinaigrette.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.desc: Supermarket Stakeout is an American cooking competition TV series presented by chef Alex Guarnaschelli. Every participant of the show has a budget of $500 to purchase the groceries from the customers of a nearby supermarket, and create dishes later out of it. In each round the host assigns the theme of the dish to cook. The chef whose dish is judged the least satisfactory is eliminated from the competition, and the final chef remaining gets a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri gets a flavour punch at a Korean-Mexican fusion place in Atlanta, an authentic Thai spot in Dallas and a real-deal Italian joint in Phoenix.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri heads back to over-the-top arepas in Norwalk, CT, island-inspired chicken wings in Mesa, AZ, and killer kebabs in Dallas.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Its Simply The Zest. Michael Symon prepares fluke Milanese and keeps things fresh with a shaved courgette salad. Liz tops it all off with a lemon drop martini.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Pork Roastin And Toastin. Michael Symon prepares smoked pork butt for pulled pork sandwiches along with crispy fried courgette chips with parmesan.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Supermarket Stakeout
